content: Guy's Thank each and everyone of you. I think I can work through this. Yesterday, one of my sisters called, our other sister, Barb is in poor health. I called her this morning, she just has a bunch of health issues. One of her son's is in poor health, he had a heart valve replaced last year. Now thats failing, he can't walk very far, he gets winded. They can't operate until he gets better, he's on medication to help him, once he is better, they will replace the valve. One of her daughters has Scleroderma, she is going down hill. Prayers please! It's time to get to church, see yall later! Bergy Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
reply: Guy's Thank each and everyone of you. I think I can work through this. Yesterday, one of my sisters called, our other sister, Barb is in poor health. content: BERGY!! Hello! Welcome! Welcome home!! You are a wonderful person. I met you FIRST at "One In The Wire" Remember? May not have made it through but you helped me. And the MOF helped me too. You're back!! Prayers & Hugs!
